title: Killer Mom
overview: When 14 years old Allison loses her father in a plane crash, three years after her adoptive mother died, she is devastated.  At the funeral, she is shocked to meet her real mom, Jessica.  Little does she and her half sister Sydni know that Jessica has a nefarious plan in the works. And she will stop at nothing to control the 40 million dollars Allison is inheriting.
